<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Facility Issues Page">67fd2b28839676104acac396feaad30f</macroponent><name>Open Record from List</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
 const { buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = '';

    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event);
 
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', defaultRoutePayload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Omar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-09 16:25:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>6c2c6412831a32104acac396feaad398</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open Record from List</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System " source="x_1850913_facili_0">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System ">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6c2c6412831a32104acac396feaad398</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Omar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-09 16:25:07</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
